lead_paragraph: FORSTER--Hamilton F.,age 83, of New York City on June 6, 2016 from complications of emphysema. Graduate of Groton School and Harvard College, 1954. Pre-deceased by wife of 49 years, Elizabeth H. Forster in June, 2008, and daughter Elizabeth E. Forster in February, 2006. He is survived by son, Timothy H. Forster, his wife, Diane, and sons John and Christopher and by daughter, Laura Forster Bowman and her daughters Lily and Chloe. Mr. Forster was an avid golfer, longtime member of Somerset Hills Country Club, and also enjoyed playing paddle tennis and squash. He was a lifelong fan of the Harvard Crimson football team and took great pride in being in the stands for the 29-29 Harvard victory over Yale in 1968. He was a First Lieutenant in the United States Army from 1954-1956, stationed primarily in West Germany. He spent many years in the securities business, retiring from Merrill Lynch in 1994. The burial will be private. Mr. Forster requested that any donations be directed to the Visiting Nurse Service of New York, Attn: Stephanie Steel, 1250 Broadway, 4th Floor, New York, NY 10001. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FORSTER, HAMILTON F.
